column2: Yo!　What can I do for you?
speaker: Sullivan

old:
フィンダムの飯はどうだ？
口に合うといいんだがな
column2: How's the food in Phindym? I hope it suits your taste.
speaker: Sullivan

old:
ダナ村ってところがあってな、
そこらへんで採れる野菜は味が濃くてウマイ！
なんというか、力強い味だ
column2: There is a place called Dana Village. The vegetables that grow around there have a rich and delicious taste! It's kind of like a strong and powerful flavor.
speaker: Sullivan

old:
腹いっぱい食ってこそ、
この筋肉も仕事する気になってくれるってもんよ
column2: Only if you eat a full meal will these muscles be willing to work!
speaker: Sullivan
